segment.source: How to Configure the Client for Disconnected Operation Mode
segment.target: How to Configure the Client for Disconnected Operation Mode

segment.source: How to Configure the Client for Disconnected Operation Mode
segment.target: How to Configure the Client for Disconnected Operation Mode

segment.source: How to Configure the Client for Disconnected Operation Mode
segment.target: How to Configure the Client for Disconnected Operation Mode

segment.source: The disconnected operation mode enables the Application Virtualization (App-V) Desktop Client or the Application Virtualization (App-V) Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services) to run applications that are stored in the file system cache of the client when the client cannot connect to the App-V Management Server.
segment.target: The disconnected operation mode enables the Application Virtualization (App-V) Desktop Client or the Application Virtualization (App-V) Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services) to run applications that are stored in the file system cache of the client when the client cannot connect to the App-V Management Server.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: In a large organization where multiple Remote Desktop Session Host (RD°Session Host) servers (formerly Terminal Servers) are linked in a farm to support many users, using a single App-V Management Server to support the farm represents a single point of failure.
segment.target: In a large organization where multiple Remote Desktop Session Host (RD°Session Host) servers (formerly Terminal Servers) are linked in a farm to support many users, using a single App-V Management Server to support the farm represents a single point of failure.

segment.source: To provide high availability to support the RD Session Host farm, consider linking two or more App-V Management Servers to use the same database.
segment.target: To provide high availability to support the RD Session Host farm, consider linking two or more App-V Management Servers to use the same database.

segment.source: To enable disconnected operation mode
segment.target: To enable disconnected operation mode

segment.source: Set the following registry key value equal to 1 to enable disconnected operation mode:
segment.target: Set the following registry key value equal to 1 to enable disconnected operation mode:

segment.source: HKEYLOCALMACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftSoftGrid4.5ClientNetworkAllowDisconnectedOperation
segment.target: HKEYLOCALMACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftSoftGrid4.5ClientNetworkAllowDisconnectedOperation

segment.source: To set a time limit on disconnected operation mode use
segment.target: To set a time limit on disconnected operation mode use

segment.source: Set the following registry key value to 1:
segment.target: Set the following registry key value to 1:

segment.source: HKEYLOCALMACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftSoftGrid4.5ClientNetworkLimitDisconnectedOperation
segment.target: HKEYLOCALMACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftSoftGrid4.5ClientNetworkLimitDisconnectedOperation

segment.source: Set the following registry key value to the number of minutes you want to limit disconnected operation mode.
segment.target: Set the following registry key value to the number of minutes you want to limit disconnected operation mode.

segment.source: The valid range of values is 1–999999.
segment.target: The valid range of values is 1–999999.

segment.source: The default value is 90 days or 129,600 minutes.
segment.target: The default value is 90 days or 129,600 minutes.

segment.source: HKEYLOCALMACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftSoftGrid4.5ClientNetworkDOTimeoutMinutes
segment.target: HKEYLOCALMACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftSoftGrid4.5ClientNetworkDOTimeoutMinutes

segment.source: To configure the Client for Remote Desktop Services for disconnected operation mode
segment.target: To configure the Client for Remote Desktop Services for disconnected operation mode

segment.source: Set the following registry key value to 1 to enable disconnected operation mode:
segment.target: Set the following registry key value to 1 to enable disconnected operation mode:

segment.source: HKEYLOCALMACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftSoftGrid4.5ClientNetworkAllowDisconnectedOperation
segment.target: HKEYLOCALMACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftSoftGrid4.5ClientNetworkAllowDisconnectedOperation

segment.source: Set the following registry key value to 0 (zero) to allow unlimited use of disconnected operation mode:
segment.target: Set the following registry key value to 0 (zero) to allow unlimited use of disconnected operation mode:

segment.source: HKEYLOCALMACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftSoftGrid4.5ClientNetworkLimitDisconnectedOperation
segment.target: HKEYLOCALMACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftSoftGrid4.5ClientNetworkLimitDisconnectedOperation

segment.source: Ensure that all packages are preloaded into the cache to improve performance.
segment.target: Ensure that all packages are preloaded into the cache to improve performance.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: Disconnected Operation Mode
